As a fitness trainer at our gym, your primary responsibility will be to design and implement fitness programs that are tailored to the needs of our members. You will work one-on-one with clients to assess their fitness levels, set goals, and create personalized plans that will help them achieve their objectives.
In addition to creating individualized fitness programs, you will also be responsible for leading group fitness classes, including cardio, strength training, and yoga. You will use your knowledge of exercise science, anatomy, and nutrition to educate clients on the best ways to achieve their goals and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
As a fitness trainer, you will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and research in the fitness industry. This includes attending industry conferences and workshops, and maintaining your certification and continuing education credits.
Other responsibilities may include:

Assisting with gym operations, including membership sales and facility upkeep
Conducting fitness assessments and tracking progress for clients
Maintaining a clean and organized gym environment
Demonstrating proper technique and form for exercises
Motivating and encouraging clients to stay on track with their fitness goals

The ideal candidate for this position will have a passion for fitness and helping others, as well as excellent communication and interpersonal skills. You should be able to work well in a team environment and be comfortable working with people from a wide variety of backgrounds and fitness levels. A degree in exercise science, sports medicine, or a related field is preferred, as well as relevant certification from a recognized organization such as ACSM or NASM.
You may send your resume on through whatsapp on this number : 03029622558 or email at shaigithebest@gmail.com or you can visit Shareef Complex Gulgust Colony Multan for the interview between 12pm to 5pm

JOB DESCRIPTION:
Databeys is looking to hire a junior SOFTWARE DEVELOPER to join our team at Multan Office for a 3-month internship which will lead to a permanent job. The motto of our company is to make a difference in the IT industry and move toward success with a dedicated team. The selected candidate will collaborate with software development engineers to understand project features, review technical designs, and implement automated test tools to deliver new features. This is a great opportunity for a developer to excel in their career by becoming part of the team and growing their careers by working on cutting-edge technologies and solving problems involving a huge amount of data, high availability, and scalability in a professional environment. This is a great opportunity for developers who possess the skills to prioritize tasks and communicate clearly. The selected intern will be hired as a permanent employee on his/her good performance and dedication.
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Candidate must have knowledge of Node.js.
Strong proficiency with Node.js frameworks, i.e. Express.
Strong proficiency in front-end JavaScript frameworks, i.e React.
Must be Hands-on practice in Databases like Mongo, MYSQL, or SQL.
Working knowledge of Webservices of AWS, AZURE, or GCP.
Familiarity with RESTful API.
Developed and maintain APIs.
Knowledge of CRMs will be an edge point.
Must have strong problem-solving skills.

REQUIREMENTS:

Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, IT, or Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
Fresh students can apply for developing better skills and experience in fieldwork.
Demonstrable experience building scalable solutions
Strong verbal and written English communication skills
Must be a self-starter with a strong desire to increase efficiency
